name: Pocket Zoo: Idle Keeper
description:
The city zoo is in danger! Save it by taking care of the abandoned animals. Start by opening the animal zones to draw earnings. Use earnings to upgrade more and beyond! Watch the zoo as it thrives again thanks for your hard work. Let us tell you a secret: a thriving zoo means happier animals!

Tap your way to rescue the zoo! Tap to open the zones, tap to hire caretakers, tap to boost earnings, everything is just under your taps. All you need to do is to hit your screen. The animals can (and will) thank you later.

Every rescue effort will be acknowledged! Upgrade the zones as suggested to win prizes and boost your zoo, everything is for the sake of the cute animals! What did we say earlier? Right! The power of upgrades lies on your taps.

What are you waiting for? Come join in and own HUGE excitement of a zoo in your tiny pocket!

Pocket Zoo: Idle Keeper, features:

AN ANIMAL CLICKER GAME FOR RESCUE MASTERS LIKE YOU!
• Wherever can be an animal sanctuary if the animals have a master like you! Just with your fingers, everything's possible!
• Tap and tap like there is no tomorrow... More taps, more earnings, happier animals... You got how it works!
• When you're done tapping, just take a rest and enjoy nature, as your zoo will still generate earnings even when you are away.
• Don't just get enough of current earnings, upgrade more to break the boundaries! All for the sake of the cute animals!

RESCUE EFFORT IS EFFORTLESS, SOMETIMES...
• You can always tap to take care of the animals! Otherwise, feel free to hire the caretakers to help and save all those taps for something else.
• Hire as many caretakers as possible, assign and swap them between the animal zones of your preference. Let them do the work while you idle.
• Each caretakers have their own hidden talent and skills! Activate caretakers' ultimate skills to make your zoo even better, and your animals happier!

UNLOCK POWERFUL ITEMS
• What is better than a zoo? A NEWLY OPENED ZOO! Upgrade your zoo by renewing it every time possible! Gain earnings boost like you've never seen before.
• Unlock and collect useful items each with their own unique attributes. Keep the ones of your desire and get rid of things you don't need!
• A true rescuer can never had enough. Unlock missions and complete them to earn rewards!

REACH BEYOND MONEY!
• Befriend the hard-working coding chimp, the only coding chimp you'll ever meet on sober days. Feel free to ask him for booster as his favorite line is "monkey give money".
• Get your thumbs ready for the luckiest claw machine. Win bonuses and forget unlucky strikes as you'll always win what you need here.

Hear that? I can already spot the animals' cheer! Greet and befriend them now! Make sure you got all your equipment on as this game will bring you to an exciting adventure!

P.S. Your suggestions are treasures to us. Please do not hesitate to reach us via info@alegrium.com!
